presentation.greeting: Hello! I'm Juani Lagreca, a physical trainer and coach
presentation.firstText: I have over 10 years of experience, and my goal is to help you achieve your objectives effectively and sustainably by providing a personalized approach and tangible results.
presentation.question: What does my training approach offer you?

itemsText.1: Over 10 years of professional physical training experience.
itemsText.2: Specifically designed for your needs and goals.
itemsText.3: Individualized focus on you in every session.
itemsText.4: Collaborative work and monitoring of your progress.

presentation.lastText: Whether you're looking to lose weight, gain strength, improve your overall fitness, or achieve any other wellness-related goal, I'm here to guide you every step of the way. Don't wait any longer to transform your life! Contact me today, and together we will help you achieve your goals effectively and sustainably.

pillars.title: The Pillars of JL Training
pillars.subtitle: THAT WILL LEAD YOU TO YOUR GOALS
items: ADAPTABLE STRENGTH AND ENDURANCE TO YOUR LEVEL

plans.title: Choose the plan that best suits your needs

elPatio.title: Discover El Patio: Your Ideal Place to Train
